    • Constructor Detail

      • MapQuestDirections

        public MapQuestDirections(RouteActivity routeActivity,
                  com.nutiteq.components.MapPos start,
                  com.nutiteq.components.MapPos end,
                  Map<String,String> routeParameters,
                  String apiKey,
                  com.nutiteq.projections.Projection projection,
                  com.nutiteq.style.StyleSet<com.nutiteq.style.LineStyle> lineStyleSet)
        Parameters:
        routeActivity - listener for directions result (callback)
        start - start point, in Wgs84
        end - end point of route, in Wgs84
        apiKey - your MapQuest API key
        lineStyleSet - StyleSet for route line, e.g. new StyleSet(LineStyle.builder().setWidth(0.05f).setColor(0xff9d7050).build())
